Accuracy.description: The accuracy of the solution to the given math problem

Solution_Depth.description: The depth of the solution provided in terms of showing all steps and important calculations

Clarity.description: The clarity of the explanation provided in the solution and the use of mathematical notation

Efficiency.description: The efficiency of the solution in terms of the method chosen and the optimization of calculations

Use_of_Identities.description: The appropriate use of mathematical identities and formulas in the solution process
